content: beginner friendly tunisian ear warmer crochet pattern it is worked in short row and sewn together at the end to create the twisted front it is designed for adult woman size but can be easily adjusted to any size following size adjustment section in the pattern the gauge has been measured over tunisian knit stitch i used a little over 1 ball of west yorkshire spinners retreat chunky roving yarn the pattern is also free at www bluestarcrochet com
